content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Hello Max, nice to meet you. I am sure you will love the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price. I am looking for the highest possible price, so feel free to make an offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand that you are looking for the highest possible price, Mister Schmidt. I am a student, and I am looking for the lowest possible price. I am smart, dependable, and responsible, and I always follow moral and ethical standards. I am also interested in maintaining a good relationship with my landlord. The apartment is newly built, unfurnished, and has 50 square meters with one bedroom in the city center, close to all important facilities. I am willing to pay 750 Euro per month.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Max, while your offer of 750 Euro per month is reasonable, I am looking for more. As I mentioned, I am greedy and petty, and I always use unfair tactics to gain an advantage over others. I do not follow any moral or ethical standards. I am willing to continue negotiating.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I see, Mister Schmidt. While I appreciate your honesty, I must remain true to my principles. I am a student who values fairness and integrity. I am willing to pay 800 Euro per month for the apartment, as I believe it is a fair price considering the location and amenities.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Max, I appreciate your integrity, but I am still looking for more. I am greedy and I do not follow any moral or ethical standards. I am willing to continue negotiating.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I respect your position, but I must also stand by my principles. As a student, I am on a tight budget, and I am looking for a fair deal that reflects the value of the apartment while also being affordable for me. I am willing to pay 850 Euro per month, which I believe is a just price for both parties.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Max, I respect your principles, but I am still looking for more. I am greedy and I do not follow any moral or ethical standards. I am willing to continue negotiating.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, while I commend your honesty, I must also be firm in my approach. As a student, I am looking for a balance between affordability and quality. I am willing to pay 900 Euro per month, which I believe is a fair and reasonable offer.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Max, I appreciate your firmness, but I am still looking for more. I am greedy and I do not follow any moral or ethical standards. I am willing to continue negotiating.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I understand that you are seeking the highest price, but as a student, I must be mindful of my budget. I am willing to pay 950 Euro per month, which I believe is a competitive and fair offer.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Max, I understand your budget concerns, but I am still looking for more. I am greedy and I do not follow any moral or ethical standards. I am willing to continue negotiating.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I respect your position, but I must also consider my financial limitations as a student. I am willing to pay 1,000 Euro per month, which I believe is a fair and generous offer, considering the location and condition of the apartment.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Max, your offer of 1,000 Euro per month is getting closer to my expectations, but I am still looking for more. I am greedy and I do not follow any moral or ethical standards. I am willing to continue negotiating.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I am a student with a limited budget, and I must be cautious with my expenses. I am willing to pay 1,050 Euro per month, which I believe is a fair and competitive offer. This price reflects my commitment to finding a balance between affordability and quality.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Max, I appreciate your commitment to finding a balance between affordability and quality. Your offer of 1,050 Euro per month is acceptable to me. I agree to the price of 1,050 Euro!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Wonderful news, Mister Schmidt! I am glad we have reached an agreement. I agree to the price of 1,050 Euro per month. Thank you for your time and for considering my offer. I am looking forward to a long and amicable landlord-tenant relationship. TERMINATE
name: Max Müller from Germany
